split

Contact | Privacy Policy



split is a free iOS application created by Jacob Tepperman in May 2021.

This app deals in no way with real money or transfers, it serves only as a transaction ledger for groups of people.

The goal of creating this application was to help keep track of where money was owed within groups of students

Click the link above to send a contact form, or email me at jtepp@icloud.com

The backend for this application is entirely based in Google's Firebase service.

Feel free to contact them with any security or privacy concerns.
